tab1.text1:
This server is still in development, but highly functional.

Please be sure to check out 'Server Rules' and join our Discord for updates


When you're getting started, head over to our community center at 91.6 Lat 49.3 Lon. Free resources, food and shelter.


You can access the menu any time by pressing F1 on your keyboard.

tab2.text1:
Getting set up on the shop is easy!

You earn 50 gold coins for every half hour played. You also have the opportunity to earn coins from taming, killing and harvesting. Coins can be exchanged for purchases from the shop!

Access the shop by going to your inventory, and clicking the home icon on the bottom right. To close the shop, click 'off' the shop

tab3.text1:
There are currently no planned events.

These will be added when the server is out of development.
